title: Oil Declines as Trump’s Push to Take Greenland Rattles Markets
description: Oil declined as US President Donald Trump’s attempts to annex Greenland sent jitters through wider markets.
content: Oil declined as US President Donald Trump’s attempts to annex Greenland sent jitters through wider markets.
